CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 8, 1958, A15 reads: "Fun At Graduation Prom - These gay Herron Hill Junior High School students appear to be having one grand time at their graduation prom held in school gym. Dancing ranged from waltzing and a grand march to "the slop," which some just had to do in order to complete a fun-packed evening.  Walt Harper's smart combo furnished the music. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Young men and women, including Barbara Payne wearing dark sleeveless top, dancing to Walt Harper's band, with Walt Harper playing cowbell in gymnasium, for Herron Junior High School graduation prom
